adDetails: Go Go Tennis - 2014 Summer Tennis Camp and Tennis Clinics Enrollment starts now. Summer Tennis Camp Sign up for Weekly Camps (ages 7-18) July 16 to Aug 29, 2014 9am-Noon Summer Tennis Clinics Daily tennis clinics (you can customize the tennis clinics with your summer planning) Monday - Saturdays (ages 7-18) 10am - Noon See details at www.GoGo-Tennis.com for ummer tennis discounts. Summer Tennis Participants will be challenged with fun and exciting games as well as tennis drills that will dramatically improve his/her overall experience for the sport of tennis Your child can get a jump start to tennis by enrolling in our Year-Round Tennis Clinics (group lesson) and Private Lessons for Juniors, ages 4-18. Check our web site @ www.GoGo-Tennis.com for our year-round tennis registration details and schedule. Contact us via emial, show contact info or call show contact info
